title: PATCHER STUCK AT 75% APPLYING PATCHES (7.5)
body: My patcher is stuck at 75% saying it is applying patches but it has not moved for about an hour. Prior to this i had updated to the beta client but my computer couldn't handle the beta so i deleted League of Legends and Reinstalled. Ever since then i have been running into problems with the patcher such as the Patcher window going White and having to force quit. Any help would be great TIA

replies.body:
If your patcher is getting stuck at 75%, this is a pretty good sign that there is a break in the connection between your network and our game server. Let's run through our [Connections Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to narrow down the issue.

Hit me up if you've got any other questions!
my patcher would go white after a while? do you know what causes that?

Your patcher going white after awhile sounds like it may be crashing while trying to make a connection to our servers. Your pc might not have the right permissions for League to make that connection. Check out the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to be sure that your pc allows the patcher to connect to our server. 

Let me know if this helps.
I forgot to say that its on a mac...

Aha! For the Mac side you'll need a different guide, which you can find [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#mq9) 

Feel free to let me know how _that_ one works!
